title: Fantasy music pack
description: Fantasy music pack is a music for fantasy with brilliant orchestration.
longDescription:
Fantasy music pack is a package of 14 songs that exploit the full potential of the orchestra.


All of the songs have been designed to enhance the game or movie scene, making the music the best it can be for the listener and Player.

All of the instruments used in the songs are professionally made and no compromises have been made.

And to make the best of the pack, the same instruments are used and several motifs are shared among the various songs.

There is no need to worry about sudden changes in musicality.


DEMO SONG

You can lisning all the songs here.

https://soundcloud.com/otobox/sets/fantasy-music


LOOPS

10 of the 14 tracks have intro + loops available.

Loops need to be specified in terms of number of samples, so use Wwise, CRIware, FMOD, etc.

The specified values are listed in the Cue file.

The loop version also comes with a version without the loop, so you can use it as a one-shot.

If you need a file in a special format, please contact us.


A brief description of the song


1. Fantasy The origin

 This music is intended to be used at the beginning of a story or stage.


2. Fantasy explore 01(loop)

 This music is intended to be used in a place or field where magnificent nature can be seen.


3. Fantasy explore 02(loop)

 This music is intended to be used mainly for field exploration.


4. Fantasy combat (loop)

 Intended for use during normal combat.


5. Fantasy Boss stage(loop)

 Assuming a boss battle.


6. Fantasy explore night(loop)

 This music is mainly intended to be used when exploring the field at night, or in places with a vague atmosphere.


7. Fantasy snow explore(loop)

 This music is intended to be used in snowy landscapes, freezing cold fields and dungeons.


8. Fantasy foggy island(loop)

 This music is intended to be used to create an atmosphere of mystery, fog, or blurred space.


9. Fantasy Dungeon(loop)

 This song is intended to be used in dungeons, caves, and other places with a very dark atmosphere.


10. Fantasy Abandoned cave(loop)

 This song is intended to be used in dark and dangerous fields and dungeons, such as caves, ruins, and abandoned buildings.


11. Fantasy Lost Hero

 A castle with slightly crumbling walls, a castle in the rain, a city. This song is intended to be used as a requiem.


12. Fantasy New wind

 Fantasy New Wind is intended to be used in a peaceful meadow, a forest with sunlight filtering through the trees, or a field after a rain.


13. Fantasy Change Story

 This song is intended to be used in a change from a sad scene, or in a field when the snow is melting.


14. Fantasy Anew day(loop)

 This song is intended to be used at the start of a new chapter, the beginning of a new day, or any other major break in the story.


If you want more detailed information, open each song on SoundCloud.


For any question, request or custom music you can contact me at: otobox-ueqa@outlook.jp
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Intro + loop music.
  •  Full orchestra
  •  Balance adjusted in a dedicated studio.

Number of Audio Wavs:24

Number of Audio Cues:24

Sample 44.100 Hz /16bit

Does music loop: (Yes)

Minutes of audio provided:54min(loop and cut including)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (All)

Mac: (All)

Documentation（EN,JP): https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1FZNQNxE_WLteb_9IVm_0KCi6_UnL3jWD?usp=sharing

Important/Additional Notes:

Target LUFS -14.0 

True peak -0.1
